|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM926EJS |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 300 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320CBTC-90G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM638165TS-6G; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = IC+;IP175C;IC+;IP175C, 0702S13, FPR2876.1; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:17:3F |oui = 00:17:3F |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.9;(vender modified); |stockos = Linux;2.6.17;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.2 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 9-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, Gemtek type1 pinout,, (38400 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = Belkin_N1_Wireless_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Belkin_N1_Wireless_[0-9A-F]{6}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WRTR-203GN |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/15/2007 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B000FPIVLU |asin_country = US |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2860;RT2860RT, GS73840D0, 0705ST; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2820; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WRTR-203GN_V02", "190-c04-6701R", and "RoHS" is silkscreened on the board of the sample unit shown in this entry. The SSID is '''Belkin_N1_Wireless_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last 3 octets of the MAC address (upper-case letters). ==Probable included PSU(s)== The power adapter included with the device is probably a '''DVE''' DSA-12R-12 AUS 120120. ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. {{hasPowerSupply |brand = DVE |model = DSA-12R-12 AUS 120120 |input_v=100-120 |input_a=0.3 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |output_OD=5.5 |output_ID=2.2 |output_LEN=10 |e_level=4 |countrymanuf = China |style=small, horiz. }} ==Links of Interest== *[http://cache-www.belkin.com/support/dl/p75170-d_f5d8231-4_man.pdf Manual] *[http://en-us-support.belkin.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/527/~/f5d8231-4-n1-wireless-router---firmware-update Firmware] *[http://en-us-support.belkin.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/5094/kw/F5D8231-4 GPL Source Code] ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The pinout seems to be the same as is used by the [[Belkin F5D8235-4 v1]]. 
      (   )
(GND) (RxD)
(GND) (   )
(VCC) (   )
(VCC) [TxD] J6
